name: The Maze (itch) (Unlogical Game Studios)
description:
You have to get out of the maze, so fast you can. For that you have to find keys, they are placed all over the map. But careful, there are enemies, ore other obstacles wich want to kill you! (Hint: the door to the next Level has a different texture as the walls)

controls:

w, a, s,d=walk

q+w = sprint

w+q+f = slide

space=jump

left click shoot

right click =aim

weapon selection

1. Assault rifle

2.pistol

3."Shotgun"
